questions.question: What does the golden rule mean?

choices.answer: Be mean
Dont include
Treat others the way you dont want to be treated
Treat others the way you want to be treated

questions.question: Which one is a correct act of the Golden Rule?

choices.answer: Not including Lucy in your game
Ignoring Lucy when she needed help
Helping Lucy with her homework
Talking about Lucy behind her back

questions.question: Which one of these is not an act of the Golden Rule?

choices.answer: Giving Sophia a hand with her jammed locker
Tripping Sophia over at Lunch
Lending Sophia your pencil
Emailing Sophia homework when she's sick

questions.question: The Golden Rule comes from Matthew. What chapter and verse?
Where can you find the Golden Rule?

choices.answer: The Bible
A scroll
In my shoe
Websites/the internet

questions.question: Why is the Golden Rule important?

choices.answer: So that we can look like a nice person
So that we are following in God's footsteps
So that we are nice to everyone and they are nice back
So that people think we are kind

questions.question: Izzy saw that Rosie was sad and included her in her game...

choices.answer: Izzy is not following in the Golden Rule
Izzy is following in the Golden Rule

questions.question: Rosie lent Izzy her glue because Izzy lost hers...

choices.answer: Rosie is following in the Golden Rule
Rosie is not following in the Golden Rule

questions.question: Olivia took a bad photo of Zoe without Zoe's approval of posting.

choices.answer: Olivia was not following the Golden Rule.
Olivia was following the Golden Rule.
